title: The Greek Lover
description: The first thing Zoe Rousakis sees after traveling through time to ancient Greece is a naked man. Drakon, a servant of Poseidon, has a body to rival the gods and a kiss that commands her to surrender every part of herself to him. When she's with him, Zoe's psychic powers fill her mind with enticingly erotic images. But her abilities have already cost her one mission, and she can't risk being distracted by a man this time.Yet how can she keep Drakon at bay when his own dark visions show him that Zoe is in danger - and that is his destiny to save her?
author: Jocelyn Kelley
